LanguageData.Filth_OilSlick.label: Oil Slick
LanguageData.Filth_NapalmTrail.label: Napalm trail
LanguageData.NapalmBomb.label: Napalm Bomb
LanguageData.SparkGrid.label: Spark Grid
LanguageData.SparkGrid.description: Ignites flammable things such as napalm when powered.
LanguageData.OilPipeline.label: Oil Pipeline
LanguageData.pipelineValve.label: pipeline valve
LanguageData.pipelineValve.description: Opens or closes connections between pipelines.
LanguageData.OilWellHead.label: Oil Well Head
LanguageData.OilWellHead.description: Abandoned oil well, when left unused the pressure will rise back to full over time. Place a derrick directly over the well to continue using it
LanguageData.DeepOilWellHead.label: Deep Oil Well Head
LanguageData.DeepOilWellHead.description: Abandoned oil well, when left unused the pressure will rise back to full over time. Place a derrick directly over the well to continue using it
LanguageData.OilWell.label: Oil Well
LanguageData.OilWell.description: Extracts oil from underground reservoirs, requires a resource console to view the oil grid!
LanguageData.DeepOilWell.label: Deep Oil Well
LanguageData.DeepOilWell.description: Extracts oil from underground reservoirs, requires a ground radar to view the deep oil grid!
LanguageData.OilStorage.label: Crude oil storage
LanguageData.FuelStorage.label: Chemfuel storage
LanguageData.FuelStorage.description: Stores chemfuel produced by crude crackers, chemfuel can be pumped to connected chemfuel hoppers
LanguageData.ResourceConsole.label: Resource Console
LanguageData.ResourceConsole.description: Manned computer console required to operate crude crackers and refineries
LanguageData.CrudeCracker.label: Crude Cracker
LanguageData.CrudeCracker.description: Cracks crude oil into chemfuel which must be stored on connected chemfuel tanks, chemfuel can be pumped to connected chemfuel hoppers
LanguageData.FuelPowerplant.label: chemfuel powerplant
LanguageData.FuelPowerplant.description: Produces power by consuming chemfuel. Must be piped into chemfuel storage tanks.
LanguageData.LargeFuelPowerplant.label: Large chemfuel powerplant
LanguageData.LargeFuelPowerplant.description: Produces power by consuming chemfuel. Must be piped into chemfuel storage tanks.
LanguageData.ChemfuelHopper.label: chemfuel pump
LanguageData.ChemfuelHopper.description: Pumps chemfuel from chemfuel storage tanks into usable/sellable cans.
LanguageData.ChemfuelSiphon.label: chemfuel siphon
LanguageData.ChemfuelSiphon.description: Siphons chemfuel from cans into chemfuel storage tanks.
LanguageData.RefineryLoadingBay.label: Refinery unloading bay
LanguageData.RefineryLoadingBay.description: Bay required by refineries to unload product.
LanguageData.SynthyleneRefiner.label: Synthylene Refiner
LanguageData.SynthyleneRefiner.description: Processes chemfuel into synthylene with a selection of colours, synthylene can be used as a generic building material and as an ingredient for components.
LanguageData.NapalmRefiner.label: Napalm Refiner
LanguageData.NapalmRefiner.description: Processes chemfuel into napalm, a highly flammable sticky jelly used in incendiary bombs, consisting of chemfuel thickened with synthylene.
LanguageData.SynthreadRefiner.label: Synthread Refiner
LanguageData.SynthreadRefiner.description: Processes chemfuel into synthread, a synthetic fibre for clothing
LanguageData.SynthamideRefiner.label: Synthamide Refiner
LanguageData.SynthamideRefiner.description: Processes chemfuel into Synthamide weave, a high strength synthetic fibre
LanguageData.HyperweaveRefiner.label: Hyperweave Refiner
LanguageData.HyperweaveRefiner.description: Processes chemfuel into Hyperweave, a high strength synthetic fibre
LanguageData.NeutroamineRefiner.label: Neutroamine Refiner
LanguageData.NeutroamineRefiner.description: Processes chemfuel into Neutroamine for making medicine
LanguageData.Autoclave.label: Autoclave
LanguageData.Autoclave.description: Bakes uncured plasteel or synthamide composite into the final product
LanguageData.CombatExtendedFsxRefiner.label: FSX Refiner
LanguageData.CombatExtendedFsxRefiner.description: Processes chemfuel into FSX, a high-explosive chemical used in a variety of industrial and military applications.
LanguageData.Shell_Napalm.label: Napalm shell
LanguageData.Shell_Napalm.description: A shell filled with flammable gel and a small explosive charge. Starts fires when detonated. Can be fired from mortars. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_Napalm.label: Napalm shell
LanguageData.Napalm.label: Napalm
LanguageData.Napalm.description: Highly flammable sticky jelly used in incendiary bombs, consisting of chemfuel thickened with synthylene.
LanguageData.OilBarrel.label: Oil Barrel
LanguageData.OilBarrel.description: A barrel filled with crude oil, can be dumped, burned, or processed.
LanguageData.UncuredPlasteel.label: Uncured Plasteel
LanguageData.UncuredPlasteel.description: Uncured plasteel, requires curing in an autoclave.
LanguageData.Synthamide.label: Synthamide
LanguageData.Synthamide.description: Synthamide fibers are heat-resistant and strong synthetic fibers, they can be used for creating very durable clothing or to create high strength composite materials.
LanguageData.Synthylene.label: Synthylene
LanguageData.UncuredComposite.label: Uncured Synthamide Composite
LanguageData.UncuredComposite.description: Uncured Synthamide Composite, requires curing in an autoclave.
LanguageData.FiberComposite.label: Composite
LanguageData.FiberComposite.description: Synthamide composite is a high strength light weight fire resistant spacer tech composite material, made of a polymer matrix reinforced with aramid fibres.
LanguageData.FilthOil.label: Oil
